We should have had at this date a large, well-built edifice with surrounding grounds in a beautiful location, where we could co-operate with 


                                    -142- 

God in caring for sick and suffering humanity. Through this work in connection with the gospel ministry, the light of truth would shine forth. The people who are in ignorance would have an opportunity to become acquainted with health principles, and many would be led to practice the self-denial essential for health of body and clearness of mind, and they would be brought to comprehend what is truth for these last days. This is the work to be done. . . .
